name: Coralfish
description: The Coralfish is a small, brightly colored monstrosity with notable aquatic abilities and a dangerous bite.
memorable: Its petrifying bite can incapacitate opponents for a full day if untreated.
goals: Predominantly seeks to ambush and incapacitate prey in aquatic environments.
relations: May be found alongside other aquatic monsters or in coral reefs.
strengths: Good swimming speed and a powerful petrifying bite.
weaknesses: Very poor physical strength and intelligence, making it less effective on land.
attacks: The Coralfish attacks with a bite that deals piercing damage and has a chance to petrify the target.
most_powerful_ability: Petrifying bite that can restrain opponents and turn them into statues for 24 hours.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light and darkness.
additional_information: Can only breathe underwater due to its aquatic nature.
Uses a Frenzy reaction to strike back when attacked.
Low intelligence and charisma scores suggest limited reasoning.
Has a decent constitution for stamina in combat.
Excellent swimming speed enhances its ambush potential in water.
test_queries: small aquatic monster with petrifying bite
colorful fish that turns enemies to stone
dangerous underwater creature with quick strikes
